Game.Name: Backyard Football 2006 (USA)
Game.plot: Backyard Football teams up with the NFL to bring kid versions of the best tackling, passing, and running pros. You can choose from all 32 NFL teams or create your own with custom team names and uniforms. Once your team is ready, you'll pick a playing field, call the plays, and direct all the action in single games or an entire season. The game also features 30 backyard kids, a stat tracker in season play, and multiple camera angles.Cheat: Unlock more StadiumsDo the following to get the desired Stadium
Game.Notes: Backyard Football 2006 is the fourth iteration of the award-winning game that combines realistic football plays and strategies with crazy humor. Backyard Football 2006 features child versions of NFL superstars, including Peyton Manning, Tom Brady, Donovan McNabb and Daunte Culpepper. Backyard Football 2006 includes all 32 NFL teams as well as 19 wacky Backyard teams and features new backgrounds, 7x7 teams, and a power moves system.
